name: Create Teamwork Desk customers from Google Forms responses
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email output from the form using MailboxValidator. If the email is verified it will create a new Teamwork Desk account. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
